pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Recordings of NHPR programs produced for broadcast and podcast distribution. Including The Exchange, Word of Mouth, Outside/In, Civics 101, Something Wild, New Hampshire News, election coverage, 10 Minute Writers Workshop, The Bookshelf, The Front Porch, Perspectives, and The Folk Show. Date range mainly mid 80s-present.
_xcollectionFormatsxtxtxxxcollectionForm: Optical disc (Including CD, CD-R, CD-RW, DVD, DVD-R, DVD-RW, VCD)
pageContext._xxxcollectionNotesxtxt: Short descriptions of most broadcasts available, but no formal finding aid.
pageContext._xxxcollectionUsageStatementxtxt: Permission is required from NHPR to duplicate or publish any material from interviews; individual permission/release forms on file and may vary for each participant. Contact NHPR staff for further details.
